channel.title: Satis-Factory Manager online tool
channel.description:
Hello!
I have been using some satisfactory online tools for planning my factory, but I never really satisfied with them. So what's better then? A custom tool!
[Satis-Factory Manager](https://zechy.cz/satisfactory/#/) is a online tool that allows you planning your factories from scratch. Grouping buildings together, see production and power overall statistics. And manage imports & exports between your factories.
Power management here is not only about production buildings, but about every thinkable building, that consumes power. From lights to Locos!
You can try my [tool here](https://zechy.cz/satisfactory/#/).

item.title: Satis-Factory Manager online tool
item.dc:creator: @hbouma Hbouma
item.description:
@hbouma wrote:

Hi,

I was wondering what happened with your website? It was really useful!

Hal

Read full topic
